title: Subchapter A - SERVICE
content:
Subchapter A - SERVICE
State Regulations

Part 500 - Meter Approvals; Testing Of Meters; Reports Of Testing (§ 500.1 to 500.11)

Part 501 - EXTENSION OF MAINS (§ 501.1 to 501.10)

Part 502 - Construction And Maintenance Of Service Pipes (§ 502.1 to 502.4)

Part 503 - Service Standards (§ 503.1 to 503.11)

Part 504 - Discontinuance Of Service By Consumers (§ 504.1 to 504.4)

Part 510 - Consumer Deposits-waterworks Corporations (§ 510.1 to 510.10)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
